attributes.action: Stop drug dealing gang that has taken over Ponders End park
attributes.additional_details: I have contacted the police ,council, local mp ,major ,prime minister ,sky, bbc and lbc but it seems nothing is being done. This gang has taken over a family friendly park and now people are scared to take there kids there or walk their dogs something needs to be done.
attributes.background: A gang of about 60 adults and 60 youngsters have taken over the park and are selling crack cocaine and causing trouble

rejection.details:
The local council (https://new.enfield.gov.uk/) would have to take action on this, in conjunction with the police. 

You could raise this issue with your local councillors. You can find out who they are here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You could also contact the policing team for your area: http://content.met.police.uk/Borough/Enfield
